text: Jalal Eyvaz oglu Allakhverdiyev (; September 17, 1929 – January 19, 2017) was an Azerbaijani mathematician. He was a member of the Academy of Sciences of the Azerbaijan Soviet Socialist Republic (now the Azerbaijan National Academy of Sciences) (1972). He was born in Baku, Azerbaijan. Allakhverdiyev was a Azerbaijan State Prize laureate of the Azerbaijan SSR (1982).Respublikanın elmi işçilərinə Azərbaycan SSR fəxri adları verilməsi haqqında Azərbaycan SSR Ali Soveti Rəyasət Heyətinin 2 dekabr 1982-ci il tarixli Fərmanı — anl.az saytı He was director of the Institute of Cybernetics of the Academy of Sciences of Azerbaijan SSR since 1970. Allakhverdiyev died in Baku on January 19, 2017, aged 87.Allahverdiyev Cəlal Eyvaz oğlu ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Azerbaijani academics Category:Mathematicians Category:20th-century Azerbaijani people
title: Jalal Allakhverdiyev
